Reviews.Title: Getting to know the Nikon D7100
Reviews.Author: Phyllis Carter
Reviews.Content: Purchased the camera about a month ago and so far I love it. Used it professionally to do photo shoot of one-year old. Pictures required very little editing allowing me to spend my time creatively with the pictures. Camera's stabilizer worked well. Was also able to get good shots when the little one was on the move.  Close ups were really good.  Would recommend this camera to anyone who is interested in taking amateur photos to the next level.
